charges.charge_description: Ct. 1: Conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute more than 500 grams of cocaine 21 USC 846, 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B)(1)
Ct. 2: Possession with intent to distribute more than 500 grams, that is, approximately 3.3 kilograms (7.26 pounds) of cocaine 21 USC 841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(B) and 18 USC 2(2)

charges.charge_disposition: 24 months BOP. 2 years SRT. Court waives Fine. Special Assessment $100.00 remitted.

charges.charge_description: Ct. 3: Conspiracy to import more than 500 grams of cocaine 21 USC 963, 952(a) and 960(b)(2)(3)
Ct. 4: Importation of more than 500 grams, that is, approximately 3.3 kilograms (7.26 pounds) of cocaine 21 USC 952(a), 960(b)(2) and 18 USC 2(4)

Knowingly and intentionally possess with intent to distribute, approximately 3.30 kgs. of cocaine, a Schedule II controlled substance, and did knowingly and intentionally conspire to possess, with the intent to distribute, approximately 3.30 kgs. of cocaine, a schedule controlled substance; 21 USC 841(a)(1) and 21 846

charges.charge_offence_description: Knowingly and intentionally possess with intent to
